      • appendQueryString

        ReverseRoute appendQueryString(String key,
                               String... values)
        Append a parameter to this ReverseRoute Query String.
        Parameters:
        key - QueryString key
        values - QueryString values
        Returns:
        This very ReverseRoute as fluent API
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when key is null or empty, or when value is null

      • appendQueryString

        ReverseRoute appendQueryString(Map<String,?> parameters)
        Append a bunch of parameters to this ReverseRoute Query String. If the given parameters Map is a Map<String,List<?>> then each value of each list is appended to the Query String.

        This is the result of each value's toString() method that is appended to the Query String.

        Parameters:
        parameters - Parameters as a Map
        Returns:
        This very ReverseRoute as fluent API
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when parameters is null, or when one key is null or empty, or when one value is null

      • withFragmentIdentifier

        ReverseRoute withFragmentIdentifier(String fragmentIdentifier)
        Parameters:
        fragmentIdentifier - Fragment identifier
        Returns:
        This very ReverseRoute as fluent API

      • httpUrl

        String httpUrl()

        Returns:

        Returns:
        Absolute WebSocket(SSL) URL
